content.title: Scheme Of Assistance To Persons With Disabilities For Purchase/Fitting Of Aids And Appliances
content.details: Scheme of Assistance to Persons with Disabilities for Purchase/Fitting of Aids and Appliances is a scheme by the Social Welfare Department, Govt. of Manipur. In this scheme, the Person with a Disability is provided with Financial Assistance for the Purchase/Fitting of Hearing Aids, Artificial Limbs, and Other Appliances. This is a State Sponsored Scheme and only the citizens who are domiciled in the State of Manipur can apply for this scheme. The percentage of disability of the applicant should be 40% and above. The application should be submitted through the respective District Social Welfare Officer.
benefits: Financial Assistance for the Purchase/Fitting of Hearing Aids, Artificial Limbs, and Other Appliances.
eligibility: The applicant should be a domicile of the state of Manipur.
The percentage of disability should be 40% and above.

The applicant should not have received assistance during the last 3 years for the same purpose from any firm / approved organization. However, for children below 12 years of age, this limit would be one year.
The monthly income of the applicant from all sources should not exceed ₹ 15,000/- per month.
In the case of dependents, the income of parents/guardians should not exceed ₹ 15,000/- per month.
documents_required: Income Certificate (issued by the concerned revenue officer, not below the rank of Sub-Deputy Collector) in respect of beneficiaries staying in orphanages, halfway home, aged homes, etc.
Disability Certificate (issued by the Competent Authority).
Residential / Domicile Certificate of the state of Manipur.

faqs.question: Can Applicants From Neighboring States Also Apply To This Scheme?
faqs.answer: No, the applicant should be a domicile in the state of Manipur.

faqs.question: Which Department Manages The 'Scheme Of Assistance To Persons With Disabilities For Purchase/Fitting Of Aids And Appliances'?
faqs.answer: 'Scheme of Assistance to Persons with Disabilities for Purchase/Fitting of Aids and Appliances' is managed by the Social Welfare Department, Govt. of Manipur.

faqs.question: What Is The Full Form Of PwD?
faqs.answer: The Full Form of PwD is 'Person with Disability'.

faqs.question: Can Transgenders Also Apply To This Scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, this scheme is open to applicants from all genders.

faqs.question: Does This Scheme Accept Online Applications?
faqs.answer: No, this scheme only accepts offline applications.

faqs.question: Is This Scheme State Sponsored Or Centrally Sponsored?
faqs.answer: This scheme is a State Sponsored Scheme.

faqs.question: What Are The Criteria With Respect To The Percentage Of Disability?
faqs.answer: The percentage of disability of the applicant should be 40% and above.

faqs.question: Are 'Artificial Limbs' Covered In The List Of Appliances?
faqs.answer: Yes, 'Artificial Limbs' is covered in the list of appliances.

faqs.question: Where Can I Find The Link To The Scheme Guidelines?
faqs.answer: The scheme guidelines can be found at this link - https://socialwelfare.mn.gov.in/media/filer_public/b4/0d/b40d053e-337a-433f-96ba-7a88f17fa992/artificial_aids.pdf

faqs.question: Where Can I Find The Link To The Application Form?
faqs.answer: The application form can be found at this link - https://socialwelfare.mn.gov.in/media/filer_public/b4/0d/b40d053e-337a-433f-96ba-7a88f17fa992/artificial_aids.pdf

faqs.question: Will I Be Eligible To Apply If My Monthly Income From All Sources Is ₹ 35,000/-?
faqs.answer: No, in order to be eligible, the monthly income of the applicant from all sources should not exceed ₹ 15,000/-.

faqs.question: Will I Be Eligible To Apply If I Have Received Financial Assistance Two Years Ago For The Same Purpose From A Firm?
faqs.answer: No, in order to be eligible, the applicant should not have received assistance during the last 3 years for the same purpose from any firm / approved organization.

faqs.question: What Is The Full Form Of DSWO?
faqs.answer: The Full Form of DSWO is 'District Social Welfare Officer'.

faqs.question: How Will The Name Of The Beneficiaries Be Made Available?
faqs.answer: The name of the selected beneficiaries will be made available on the Department's website or displayed on the notice board of the Directorate, Social Welfare/ District Social Welfare Offices.

faqs.question: To Whom Should The Application Form Be Submitted?
faqs.answer: The application form should be submitted to the Office of the District Social Welfare Officer.

faqs.question: What Is Meant By 'EPIC Card'?
faqs.answer: 'EPIC Card' means Election Photo Identity Card.

faqs.question: By Whom Should The Income Certificate Be Issued?
faqs.answer: The Income Certificate should be issued by the concerned revenue officer, not below the rank of Sub-Deputy Collector.

faqs.question: What Are The Mandatory Documents Required To Apply For This Scheme?
faqs.answer: The following documents are required mandatorily to apply for this scheme: • Income Certificate (issued by the concerned revenue officer, not below the rank of Sub-Deputy Collector) in respect of beneficiaries staying in orphanages, halfway home, aged homes, etc. • Aadhaar Card. • Voter ID (EPIC). • Disability Certificate (issued by the Competent Authority). • Residential / Domicile Certificate of the state of Manipur. • Details of the Bank Account.
